resources.string: This app is a demo of the Android side panel library. Panels should always be drawn on top of all widgets. Please refer to the following link for more details!
Other widgets can also be added within the Layout. Widgets other than SidePanelView are treated as a background and the same Alpha value is applied.

Panels should always be glued to the right side. If you put a SidePanelView as a SidePanelLayout child view, it will automatically position itself. A SidePanelView should not have a Margin on the right side.
